name: Arena Wars 2
description: Arena Wars 2 is the sequel of the award-winning Arena Wars series and combines revolutionary RTS fights with RPG elements.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: 2.0+GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphic ships with shader 3.0 support DirectX®: 9.0c Hard Drive: 600 MB HD space Sound: Direct X 9.0c compatible  Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

reviews.review_text: This game is awful. The camera is shaky and zoomed in way too far. Items are overpowered. Scoring system is terrible. Units are awkward to control and you can't have too many out at once. Maps are small and encourage placing units at item spawns to win the game that way. Unit abilities only work 50% of the time. Calling precision air strikes at the start of the match is a ♥♥♥♥♥♥ game mechanic. Payed 49 cents for the game. Normally i dont care for such a low cost but i kind of want my money back at this point.
Can not get this game to work.

I can't blame the game for the lack of an online community - but it harms it tremendously. The core mechanics are definitely worth a look.Got it for a dollar and it's well worth it. Unfortunately it's not worth much more than that.
If you can get it working, theres alot of fun to be had here. Pick it up for $1 on sale.

Arena Wars 2 is a simple real time lane strategy game. It has reasonable graphics and simple game mechanics. Build units, clobber enemy units and then steal and capture enemy resources. If you are looking for a short fast paced strategy game this one should suffice. It feels more like an arcade game than like a strategy game. Nothing special, but fun to play.
It's a classic like the old Command & Conquer series.

Game runs like a turd even on a good rig. Honestly, I think this game could have been a lot better. The game has a very steep learning curve, that throws you into the game and just says 'Go on, you can play now'. With no tutorial to introduce you to the games elements it's like walking blind. It took me a good solid thirty minutes to figure out how to, upgrade a unit. There are many things wrong with this game, but look on the bright side, it's graphics are good. All in all, I would not reccomend this game.
